catalogue_raissonne: Murase, Art through a Lifetime, no. 236
creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: colorful images of a daimyo procession leaving Edo, traveling through the various notable stops and stations of the Tokaido road; castles, villages; tea houses; mountains, and other landscapes; stops are labeled in gold pigment
markings: Mark on inside of roller: [Tenna 2nd[?] Year (1683) Early Autumn: His Lordship\'s Picture Scroll]; Seals LLC at end of scroll: [Hishikawa]; [Moronobu]
medium: Ink, color, and gold on silk
title: Tōkaidō Picture Scroll
